text: Drifting Clouds () is a 1996 Finnish comedy drama movie directed by Aki Kaurismäki and starring Kati Outinen, Kari Väänänen, Markku Peltola, Elina Salo. It was distributed by Sputnik. ==Other websites== * * Category:1996 comedy-drama movies Category:Finnish movies Category:German drama movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aki Kaurismäki
title: Drifting Clouds (movie)
